options.name: Adaptive Mind
options.description: You have learned to bend reality through controlled change. Gain +1 skill with meta magic.

options.name: Action : Flux Field
options.description: You create an area of unstable reality with a radius of 5 units within a moderate (20 units) range. Until the start of your next turn, the first time each ally inside this field rolls a '1' on a dice face, they reroll that dice.

options.name: Reaction : Amplify Force
options.description: In response any creature making a melee attack, but before the result of the roll is known, amplify that attack. Each extra damage dice is instead upgraded to primary damage.

options.name: Adaptive Resistance
options.description: Your body learns to resist harmful forces. Gain +1 skill with endurance. Additionally, at the start of each day, roll a meta magic check and gain the mitigation of your choice equal to half the total rolled.

options.name: Mutable Form
options.description: You adapt to change more easily, both mentally and physically. Gain +1 skill with resilience. Additionally, You can alter minor physical features (hair color, eye color, height by 6 inches) over the course of 10 minutes.

options.name: Immutable
options.description: You are naturally immutable. Gain +2 aether mitigation. You are unable to be affected by transformation magic, whether beneficial or harmful. This includes: size or shape changes, petrification, aging/time effects, and spells that modify your fundamental nature or temporal existence.

options.name: Skilled Metamage
options.description: Your mastery over the forces of change has grown considerably. Gain +1 skill with meta magic.

options.name: Reaction : Amplified Resistance
options.description: In response to taking damage that matches your Adaptive Resistance type, halve the damage before mitigation is applied. Then reduce your current Adaptive Resistance mitigation by 1. If reduced to 0, you lose all Adaptive Resistance benefits until your next full rest.

options.name: Daily Action : Energy Discharge
options.description: You touch an adjacent creature and discharge your adaptive energy. Make a meta magic attack against their endurance. Each successful dice deals damage equal to your current Adaptive Resistance mitigation bonus, using the same damage type you chose for that mitigation.

options.name: Master Metamage
options.description: You have become a true master of change and adaptation. Gain +1 talent with meta magic spells.
